title: Fix This!
body: I dodged a game ( or so i thought i did) , I waited about 10min to go back and sign in to find out that a game was actually still going. I try to reconnect dosen't work i close the client open it back up and now my files starting to scan and update. I now have  this 20min ban thingy for something I had no control over wtf....

replies.body:
Ouch, it sounds like your League directory may be having some issues holding into some files. Unfortunately, we're unable to modify or remove any Leaverbuster penalties, as the system was designed so to prevent any abuse.

If the issue happens again, let me know so we can troubleshoot it to figure out what's causing it.
